subject: YOUR $10 MILLION US DOLLARS DONATION FUNDS.
body:
*WELCOME TO DESK OF  MRS. JANET YELLEN:United States secretary of the
treasury.U.S. Department of the Treasury.DONATION FUNDS OF $10 MILLION US
DOLLARS.Attention:*
















*How are you doing today? I wish to congratulate you over your success in
our computer permit balloting sweep-stake held last December. This is a
millennium scientific computer selection permit in which email addresses
and names were used. It is a promotional program aimed at encouraging
internet users. So your email address attached to ticket number
36,5017,31,35,11, drew the lucky star numbers which consequently won the
draw in the second approved fund category. You have been approved for the
donation prize of $10 million us dollars as a donation fund.This is to
bring to you a notice that your name and your email address appeared in the
central computer ballots among the listed unpaid contract/inheritance
beneficiaries who shall receive a donation payment of $10 million US
dollars funds approved from the WORLD BANK and I.M.F OFFICE and UNITED
NATION.Note that we have 3 method options we use to distribute funds to our
customers. So therefore, You have to select any one option below on how you
will prefer to receive your donation funds of $10 million us dollars and
get back to me with your information needed in order to authorize your
donation funds of $10 million US dollars to your position.Option 1:
........................: Bank Wire Transfer. ?Option 2:
........................: ATM Card Delivery. ?Option 3:
.......................: Bank Draft Check.Note that after the registration
then your donation funds of $10 million us dollars will be released to you,
Make sure you select the option that you will receive your funds of $10
million US dollars and get back to me, I will be waiting for your urgent
reply once you receive my mail.Your full cooperation is highly
anticipated.Best Regards,Mrs. Janet YellenThe United States secretary of
the treasury : U.S. Department of the Treasury*
